All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddUserButton
Represents a add user button with specific styling for the application.
AddUserHandler
Handles the action event triggered by pressing the add user button.
AudioManager
The AudioManager class handles the playback of audio files.
AudioManagerController
 
BackButton
Represents a back button with specific styling for the application.
BackButtonHandler
Handles the action event triggered by clicking the back button.
Card
 
CardButton
Represents a card button in the game interface.
ChangeNicknameButton
Represents a change nickname button with specific styling for the application.
ChangeNicknameHandler
Handles the action event triggered by clicking the reset button.
ComputerPlayer
 
ComputerPlayerListener
Controller responsible for managing computer player actions during the game.
DeckOfCards
Represents a deck of 52 cards, designed as a poker deck of cards.
DecksPanel
This class represents the panel containing the decks and the drawn card in the game interface.
DiscardPile
This class is designed to represent the discard pile of cards.
DiscardPileButton
Represents the discard pile button in the game interface.
DrawFromDiscardPileListener
Handles the action event when the player clicks on the discard pile button to draw a card.
DrawFromStockPileListener
Handles the action event when the player clicks on the stock pile button to draw a card.
DrawnCard
Represents the card drawn from the deck in the game interface.
EffectAudioManager
The EffectAudioManager class extends AudioManager and provides methods to play various sound effects.
EffectsButton
The EffectsButton class extends the ImageButton class and represents a button for managing audio effects.
EffectsButtonHandler
The EffectsButtonHandler class implements ActionListener interface to handle actions performed on the EffectsButton.
EmptyDeckException
 
ExitGameButton
Represents an exit game button displayed in the game session.
ExitGameHandler
Handles the action event triggered when press the exit game button.
FullDeckException
 
FullGame
Represents a full game mode, consisting of multiple matches.
FullGameModalityHandler
This class handles the action event generated by selecting the "Full Game" mode in a JComboBox.
Game
Abstract class representing a card game.
GameFrame
Represents the main frame for the game, containing the human display panel and the game table panel.
GameStatusManager
Manages the status and turns of players in the card game.
GameTable
Represents the game table, which includes stock piles, discard piles, players, and cards.
GameTablePanel
Represents the main game table panel where players and decks are displayed during the game.
GameTerminationController
Controller responsible for managing game termination conditions and ending the game accordingly.
GameTimeHandler
Handles the game time and updates the timer label accordingly.
HandPanel
Abstract class representing a panel to display a player's hand of cards.
HCardButton
Represents an horizontal card button in the game interface.
HorizontalHandPanel
Represents a horizontal hand panel in the game, extending the HandPanel class.
HuDisplayPanel
Represents the panel displaying human-related information during the game.
HumanPanel
Represents the panel for the Human player in the game.
HumanPlayer
Represents a human player in a card game, inheriting from the Player class.
ImageButton
An abstract class representing an image button with customizable icons and dimensions.
ImageUtility
Utility class for handling image-related operations, providing static methods.
InitalizeGameFrameHandler
Handles the action event triggered by initializing the game frame.
InvalidCardException
 
InvalidNumberOfPlayersException
 
JTrash
The entry point for the application.
LabeledComboBox<E>
This class represents the design a Combo Box with a label for this application.
LeftVerticalHandPanel
Represents a left-oriented vertical hand panel to display a player's hand of cards.
MainFrame
The main frame of the application, serving as the principal user interface.
MainMenuPanel
Represents the main menu panel containing buttons for main actions.
MatchesController
Controller class responsible for managing matches within a game session.
MenuManagerPanel
Manages the switching between different menus using a CardLayout within a JPanel.
ModalityGame
Enum representing the available modalities for the card game.
MusicAudioManager
The MusicAudioManager class extends AudioManager and provides a method to play music audio files.
MusicButton
The MusicButton class extends the ImageButton class and represents a button for managing music audio.
MusicButtonHandler
The MusicButtonHandler class implements the ActionListener interface to handle events triggered by the MusicButton.
NewGameButton
Represents a button for the "New Game" menu entry.
NewGameButtonHandler
ActionListener implementation for handling clicks on the "New Game" button from the MainMenuPanel.
NewGameMenuPanel
Represents the new game menu panel containing options for game mode, number of players, and buttons for go back to the main menu and for starting a new game.
Player
Abstract class representing a player in a card game.
PlayGameButton
Represents a play game button with specific styling for the application.
PlayGameButtonHandler
Handles the action event triggered by clicking the play game button.
QuitButtonHandler
Handles actions triggered by clicking the "Quit" button in the menu.
QuitGameButton
Represents a button for quitting the game.
Rank
Enumeration representing possible card ranks.
RemoveUserButton
Represents a remove user button with specific styling for the application.
RemoveUserHandler
Handles the action event triggered the click of the remove user button.
ResetButton
Represents a reset button with specific styling for the application.
ResetButtonHandler
Handles the action event triggered by clicking the reset button.
RightVerticalHandPanel
Represents a right-oriented vertical hand panel to display a player's hand of cards.
SelectedCardFromHandListener
Handles the action event when a player selects a card from their hand.
SettingsButton
 
SettingsButtonHandler
The SettingsButtonHandler class implements the ActionListener interface to handle events triggered by the SettingsButton.
SettingsMenuPanel
The SettingsMenuPanel class represents a panel in the application's settings menu.
SimpleGameFactory
SimpleGameFactory is a factory class that follows the Simple Factory design pattern.
SingleGame
Represents a single-match Trash game, extending the generic Game class.
SpacePanelCreator
Utility class for creating customized space panels with specified dimensions and colors.
StockPile
Represents a stockpile from which players must draw a card during a match.
StockPileButton
Represents the stock pile button in the game interface.
StringFormatter
The StringFormatter class provides a utility method for formatting strings.
Suite
Enumeration representing possible card suites.
SuiteColor
Possible colors for a card suite.
SwitchUserButton
Represents a switch user button with specific styling for the application.
SwitchUserHandler
Handles the action event triggered by changing the user's nickname.
TimerLabel
Represents a JLabel for displaying the elapsed time during the game as a timer.
TrashButton
Represents a button used to trash a card in the game session.
TrashButtonHandler
Handles the action event when the trash button is clicked, allowing the player to discard cards.
TurnLabel
Represents a JLabel for displaying the current turn in the game.
TurnsHandler
Handles the turn switching between players during the game.
UserHandler
The handler designed to manage the creation (eventualy) of users.
UserManager
 
UserProfileButton
Represents a button for the "UserProfile" menu entry.
UserProfileButtonHandler
ActionListener implementation for handling clicks on the "User Profile" button.
UserProfileMenuPanel
Represents the user profile menu panel containing user information and buttons for profile management.
VCardButton
Represents a vertical card button in the game interface.
VerticalHandPanel
Abstract class representing a vertical hand panel to display a player's hand of cards.
VirtualDealer
This class represents the Virtual Dealer in the card game.
